name: German Reich
startIntroPart1: Heil mein Führer, most brilliant leader of the Reich and the German people. You are the successor to the Third Reich; the empire of the illustrious German race. Germany was once a great nation, but after the humiliating defeat of the First World War, Germany has turned into nothing but a pushover to the Entente within the west, and the Communists from the East, inflation is the highest in history, and unrest and riots are everywhere. But through you, the Fatherland have risen from the ashes of our past, and made Germany a great power again in a span of a decade. Political unrest has died down, economy has boomed to competence, the people is satisfied within your rule.
startIntroPart2: O' Great leader of the Reich, the time has come, our neighbors are envious and the road to the 'Endsieg' awaits, history is now to be decided. Can you bring the greatness that the people waited for so long? can you build an everlasting and powerful Reich? Can you build a civilization that can withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: You are nothing but a nuisance to this world! You must be destroyed!
attacked: Foolishness! My Wehrmacht is invincible! Do you really think your 'army' can overtake the Reich?
defeated: The last bastion of the Reich has fallen to your hands, well done. But if you think I will surrender to you, I would prefer to blow my brains out.
introduction: Welcome, I am Adolf Hitler, Führer of the German People. Now, let us discuss regarding the lands that you have mistook to be yours.
tradeRequest: I believe this deal can be proved to be beneficial for all of us.

name: Soviet Union
startIntroPart1: Salutations Comrade Stalin, Vozhd of the Soviet Union and the great successor of Lenin, the father of our country! It is no secret that the country was made by blood and sacrifice, such act will forever be remembered within our great revolution of the 1917, and to this day, you are still remembered to fight alongside Lenin as one of his generals and liberated our motherland from the imperialist Tsarist Russia. Although our early years as a nation was difficult, we have managed to persevere and by 1945, 23 years after our nation was founded, we were then considered as a global superpower, thanks to our collective efforts as a nation.
startIntroPart2: Comrade! The time has come, the world must be liberated from such imperialistic ideals, the workers call your name. Can you build a utopia free from imperialism? Can you build a civilization that can withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: The laborers has called, we must liberate the people from the capitalist pigs such as you!
attacked: We do not like taking any foreign territory, but we shall never give up even a single grain of our lands!
defeated: Imperilaist dog! You may have crushed the Soviet Union now, but you will never destroy the spirit of the revolution!
introduction: I do not have time to talk with capitalist monsters, but if you are a friend of the workers, then you can be my friend as well.
neutralLetsHearIt: Do not make me wait then.
tradeRequest: I suggest you accept this offer for I do not trade with outsiders that often.
uniques: Nullifies Growth [in all cities] <when at war>

name: United States of America
startIntroPart1: Greetings, President Roosevelt. As we all know, you are the 32nd President of the United States, first elected in March 3, 1933. By the 1920s, America have just recently exited the Great War and onwards towards the Great Depression and the Prohibition Period. America was economically bankrupt multiple occasions and the economy managed to return to normal only by 1939, lasting for 10 years. However, due to your 'New Deal' program, the United States have managed to recover economically and get out even stronger than before! However, even after managing to deal with the economical downturn, dark clouds have began to be seen over both Europe and Asia. Another era of conflict is about to begin, and America will once again be the center of it.
startIntroPart2: Mr. President, America would require to guide it once more. You have led us out of the Great Depression, and many believed you will lead us into another American Golden Age. Can you build a civilization that can withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your reign of tyranny requires to be ended in order to restore peace. Therefore, prepare for war!
attacked: Your treachery to peace shall not easily be forgotten and I will make it certain you receive justice.
defeated: Today, we truly live in a year of infamy. But even if we're vanquished, you cannot fully conquer our hearts and minds!
introduction: I am Franklin D. Roosevelt, 32nd President of the U.S., I welcome you both as a friend and a prosepective ally.
tradeRequest: This deal can surely benefit both of our nations.
uniques: [+1 Production] from every specialist [in all cities] <after discovering [Economics]>

name: United Kingdom
startIntroPart1: Well met, Sir Winston Churchill. Prime Minister of His Majesty's Government and the United Kingdom. Before you were elected as Prime Minister of the UK, you first had a remarkable career in the military. From India to South Africa, you had served in His Majesty's behalf and even made a name for yourself during the Second Boer War. However, the most remarkable work you ever did is your service during the 2nd World War, where alone, you led the people to stand bravely before the seemingly unstoppable might of the Nazis under Adolf Hitler, and managed to prevail in the end.
startIntroPart2: Prime Minister, the people once more need a strong and charismatic leader that can lead Britain to greatness. Can you build a civilization that can withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: You have been obstructing His Majesty and his people for so long. Ready yourself for war!
attacked: We shall fight you in the beaches, we shall fight you on the landing grounds, we shall fight you in the hills, and WE will never surrender!
defeated: The last of His Majesty's Army has fallen in your hands. I applaud you as much as I loathe you. May God Save the King.
introduction: Good day to you. I am Winston Churchill, but that's 'Sir' Winston Churchill for you. It is a pleasure to make your acquiantance.
tradeRequest: This deal can surely benefit both of our nations.
uniques: Military Units gifted from City-States start with [15] XP
Militaristic City-States grant units [2] times as fast when you are at war with a common nation

name: Empire of Japan
startIntroPart1: May heaven bestow a thousand blessings upon you, Your Excellency, Hideki Tojo. Japan is a nation of indomitable warriors and soldiers who carry out the spirit of Yamato. Over the past years, we have been continously expanding our Empire and continue to flourish. So much so, that the Koreans even joined our glorious empire as their emperor swore loyalty to none other than our great nation. However, even if we continue to prosper, many are jealous of our greatness, and it will be up to you to lead our people to glory.
startIntroPart2: Your Excellency, Japan needs a great leader who can deliver the people through both hardships and glory. Can you build a civilization that can withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: The rebirth of our nation relies on this battle. Brace yourself for war!
attacked: You have made a grave mistake by attacking us. We shall make you pay dearly for every inch of land you shall take then!
defeated: May my ancestors and the Emperor forgive me, for I have been responsible for the situation in which Japan finds itself in.
introduction: Greetings, I am Hideki Tojo. Prime Minister of the Japanese people and His Majesty, Emperor Hirohito. We welcome you to our lands.
hateHello: What is it do you want?
tradeRequest: I believe this deal can be proved to be beneficial for all of us.
uniqueText:
[+10]% Strength for [Land] units when attacking. Additional +10% combat bonus when the same unit is attacking while wounded
-10% Strength for Land units when defending
No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-[Air]] units>
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [non-[Air]] units>
